dct_title_s: Géologie et principales minéralisations d'Afrique de l'ouest / BRGM ; auteurs--Lescuyer, Jean-Luc [and others] = Geology and major ore deposits of West Africa / BRGM ; authors--Lescuyer, Jean-Luc [and others]. (Chrono-lithological scale)
dct_description_sm: Map shows geologic formations, and major ore deposits. Horizontal Datum: World Geodetic System (WGS) 84." "This map is not an authority on boundaries." "Accompanied by: Geologie de l'Afrique : echelle chrono-lithologique = Geology of Africa : chrono-lithological scale; published in the framework of the 20th Colloquium of African Geology (2-7 June 2004)".
dct_creator_sm: France. Bureau de recherches géologiques et minières
dct_publisher_sm: Orléans : Bureau de recherches géologiques et minières, 2004.
